        target - its target monster
        fireballImg - pass in fireball image
        initial_tower_damage - initial damage of fireball towards monster

    • Method Detail

      • getFreeze

        public boolean getFreeze()

      • move

        public void move(ActionButton doubleSpeed,
                 ActionButton pauseButton)
        Calculate the movement of fireball by using distance formular and unit vector. The unit vectors (normalized direction vectors) are used to control the movement of a fireball. The purpose of using unit vectors in this context is to ensure that the fireball moves at a consistent speed in the direction of its target while preserving the direction of movement. the target position been add 7 and 8 to ensure the fireball hits the middle of the monsters
        Parameters:
        doubleSpeed - increase fireball speed when double speed button is on
        pauseButton - stop the fireball when pause button is on

      • decreaseHP

        public void decreaseHP(float armour)
        decrease monster hp when the fireball hit the monster
        Parameters:
        armour - percentage multiplier to damage received by this monster, higher means high damage, lower means low damage
